segments.text: Is there a swimming pool in this hotel ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We don't have a full-sized swimming pool , but we do have individual swim stations .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Basically , a swim station is like a treadmill , except instead of running , you swim .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds really neat . Is there an extra charge for these swim stations ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you're a registered guest , you have free access to our swim stations .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are the swim stations open 24 hours , like the rest of the gym ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To conserve electricity , the stations operate only from 7a . m . till 10 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll go down there as soon as I can !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think you'll be disappointed . People really seem to like the swim stations .
segments.speaker: S2
